devdoc.details: this contract inherits from openzeppelin's ownable contract

params.wonderId: is the id of the wonder 1. great monument 2. great temple 3. great university 4. hidden nuclear missile silo 5. interceptor missile system 6. internet 7. interstate system 8. manhattan project 9. mining industry consortium

is the id of the wonder 1. great monument 2. great temple 3. great university 4. hidden nuclear missile silo 5. interceptor missile system 6. internet 7. interstate system 8. manhattan project 9. mining industry consortium

generateWonders2(uint256).details: this function is only callable from the country minter contract

getGreatMonument(uint256).details: this is a public view function that will return true if a nation has the great monument wonderthis function will return true if a nation has the great monument wonder

params.id: is the nation id of the nation being queried

returns._0: bool will be true if the nation has the wonder

getWonderCosts2().details: this function will return the costs of the wonders in this contract

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

settings(address,address,address,address.details: this function is only callable by the contract ownerthis function will be called immediately after contract deployment in order to set contract pointers

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
